abstract: The president’s lawyer spoke about the damage wrought by partisanship in a final appeal to the closely divided Senate to acquit Mr. Trump.
lead_paragraph: “This should end now, as quickly as possible,” Pat Cipollone, one of President Trump’s lawyers, said  just before 3 p.m. on Tuesday, bringing an abrupt close to the defense team’s arguments not to remove Mr. Trump from office.
keywords: Trump-Ukraine Whistle-blower Complaint and Impeachment Inquiry
